title: i took 14 days ban whithout reason (give me my account back please  , read my complaints please )

replies.body:
Hey ktistakis77 - 

If someone is flaming you in game, I'd highly suggest avoiding the situation by muting the player(s). 'They started it' isn't a viable argument so your response of 'kys' isn't acceptable. Flaming/raging is against the [Summone's Code](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/summoners-code), and is a punishable offense. 

Generally, punishments are as follows - 

* First Offense: 10 Game Chat Restriction
* Second Offense: 25 Game Chat Restriction
* Third Offense: Two Week Suspension
* Fourth Offense: Permanent Suspension

However, it is possible to skip to a Two Week or Permanent suspension based on the severity of the behavior in the game. Excessive negative behavior can result in a Two-Week or Permanent suspension at any time without having a chat restriction on the account. Saying 'kys' isn't taken lightly, due to it's implications. 

I do appreciate that you realize what you've done isn't cool, and that you'll try to be a more positive player in the future. :) Here are [a few tips](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286#h2q1) that'll get you started on the right path going forward! 

That said, we don't reverse/lift bans under any circumstances in these types of situations. Unfortunately, this does mean that you won't be receiving rewards this season. :c
is there any way to see how many times uve been reported? orl ike how close you are to getting banned?
There isn't, no. The good news is, players who show consistent reform/display positive behavior in games will help heal their accounts' reputation.
consistent, means, if you don't get reported, right?
False reports won't count against you - I've been reported several times for 'refusing to buff Urgot' and my account is alive and well. :P

Actually, I do think there is. Isn't that part of the information you receive if you make a Privacy Report request?

I was tempted to make one, but they actually ask you to make a hand-written letter, and I don't know how to use a pen anymore... FML ;S

For precision's sake, they also ask for a $5 fee, but I personally don't care about that. The handwritten letter looks like a much more annoying requirement.
there's no close, just spam kys in chat and you'll get banned / permabanned, context doesn't matter, just say kys
I'm curious, a friend of mine has received two or three two-week suspensions on his current account but hasn't been banned yet, so do you guys repeat offense levels?

The escalation path isn't a  hard and fast set up, (it's listed as a general guideline), but [per the support site](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207489286) -

**BUT WHAT IF I REFORM? IS IT POSSIBLE TO GO DOWN THE ESCALATION PATH?**
Yes! Players who show consistent reform or show positive behavior in their games will help heal their accounts reputation.

Im not sure when i was banned because I havent actually played since around 2014-2015 and I tried logging in today and my account is permabanned and i cant find an email or anything saying why I haven been banned. Pls help <3

Hi! For this, you'll need to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to our player support friends - they'll have access to your account and *should* be able to tell you what happened.
Okay , i did that about 9:00 this morning but i haven't gotten a reply, but i will continue to wait. Thanks for the speedy reply :)
{{sticker:katarina-love}}
Sorry to bother again, but how long does it usually take to hear something back from a ticket request?
It depends on how many tickets are coming in - I'd say within 24 hours you'll hear something back.
Prolonged periods of good behavior can lower your tier level for the next punishment.
Be happy it's not permanent.  Now just don't say ANYTHING negative in chat...or don't chat at all to be safe.

If by without reason you mean saying something that very easily triggers the automated system twice in one game.
Doesn't matter if others were flaming, they are responsible for what they type and you are responsible for what you type.
